data.comment: In the minute -1, 1011 spectators are watching the match in Chuncheon.
The match has started.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Gangwon's half.
In the minute 3, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Chuncheon Songam Sports Town, Sangju Sangmu are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
In the minute 8, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Chuncheon, Kang Sang-uh of Sangju Sangmu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 14, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In Chuncheon Sangju Sangmu drive forward through Ahn Tae-hyeon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 15, Sangju Sangmu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Gangwon.
Jeong Ji-yong gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gangwon.
In the minute 18, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jung Suk-hwa of Gangwon is pulled up for offside.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Gangwon to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 21, It's now 1-0 thanks to an own goal from Han Seok-jong.
Gangwon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 28, Shin Kwang-hoon (Gangwon) has received a first yellow card.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Gangwon.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Kim Tae-wan is making the team's first substitution at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town with Seon-min Moon replacing Park Se-jin.
In the minute 31, Yong-woo Kim waits before resuming play because Han Kook-young for Gangwon is still down.
Oh Se-Hun (Sangju Sangmu) has received a yellow card from Yong-woo Kim.
Lee Yeong-jae (Gangwon) has replaced the possibly injured Han Kook-young at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu's Bae Jae-uh breaks free at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 37, The home team have replaced Jeong Ji-yong with Cho Jae-wan. This is the second substitution made today by Byung-Soo Kim.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
In the minute 39, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards Gangwon a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kim Bo-seob for Sangju Sangmu drives towards goal at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gangwon's Ko Mu-yeol gets in a shot on goal at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Lee Yeong-jae for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
The 1st half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Sangju Sangmu push forward at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town and Oh Se-Hun gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Gangwon defence.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
The first-half is over at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Kim Bo-seob.
That's a fine assist from Oh Se-Hun.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 50, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Gangwon push forward at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town and Kim Yeong-bin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sangju Sangmu defence.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 51, In Chuncheon, Kim Yeong-bin (Gangwon) misses the target with a header.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Throw-in Gangwon.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Kim Tae-wan (Sangju Sangmu) is making a second substitution, with Moon Chang-jin replacing Kim Bo-seob.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Sangju Sangmu push upfield and Park Yong-woo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Gangwon defence.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 62, Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Kim Seung-dae is replacing Ko Mu-yeol for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 68, Sangju Sangmu's Oh Se-Hun gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gangwon defender.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 70, Gangwon's Cho Jae-wan gets in a shot on goal at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Park Yong-woo (Sangju Sangmu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In Chuncheon Gangwon attack through Lee Yeong-jae. The finish is off target, however.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Chuncheon.
In the minute 77, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kwon Kyung-won for Sangju Sangmu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Oh Se-Hun of Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 78, Sangju Sangmu's Kwon Kyung-won looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town has been interrupted briefly for a check on Han Seok-jong, who is down injured.
In the minute 79, Attention is being given to Gangwonâ€™s Sin Se-gye and play has been suspended briefly.
At Chuncheon Songam Sports Town, Sin Se-gye has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Han Seok-jong has recovered and rejoins the match in Chuncheon.
In the minute 80, Gangwon's Sin Se-gye is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 82, Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Gangwon's Kim Seung-dae gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
In the minute 86, Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kang Sang-uh puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Seon-min Moon with an assist there.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Jung Suk-hwa of Gangwon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gangwon's half?
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
Gangwon's Sin Se-gye has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Goal! Kim Ji-hyeon (Gangwon) levels the score at 2-2 with a header.
Kim Seung-dae instrumental with a fine assist.
